pkgmetadata.longdescription: # SQLAlchemy Repository for models![tests workflow](https://github.com/Gasper3/sa-repository/actions/workflows/actions.yml/badge.svg)This project contains simple Repository pattern for SQLAlchemy models. All you need to do is:1. Install this package `python -m pip install sa-repository`2. Use it in your project ```python from sa_repository import BaseRepository from models import YourSAModel class SomeModelRepository(BaseRepository[YourSAModel]): pass ```Base class contains some general methods to simplify your work with sqlalchemy models e.x```pythonvar = SomeModelRepository(session).get(YourSAModel.attr == 'some_value')```If you don't want to create new repository classes, you can use `get_repository_from_model` method```pythonrepository = BaseRepository.get_repository_from_model(db_session, SomeModel)```
